description:
A basic 101 introduction to the Chemistry

Includes:

Introduction,
Atoms and atomic structure,
Electrons and quantum numbers,
Chemical bonding,
Equations and reactions,
The periodic table,
Periodic trends,
Periodic table properties,
Solids and liquids,
Solutions,
Gas and gas laws,
Heat and chemical kinetics,
Stoichiometry,
Electrochemistry,
Radioactivity,
Organic chemistry,
Hydrocarbons,
Adding atoms to hydrocarbons,
Chemistry of life,
Biochemistry,
Vitamins and proteins,
Carbon based molecules.


Updated content based on customer feedback.

Also added search based on customer feedback.

Please write to us. We would love to improve this app.
